description: This file defines the main Backbone.js view for a TodoMVC application, managing UI interactions, rendering, and collection updates.

classes.name: app.AppView
classes.description: Top-level Backbone View managing the TodoMVC application's user interface and interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up event bindings, fetches initial data, and initializes UI elements.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI to reflect the current state of the Todo collection.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Creates and appends a view for a single Todo item.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Adds all Todo items to the list view.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a single Todo item.

methods.name: filterAll
methods.description: Applies filtering to all Todo items.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Generates attributes for a new Todo item.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new Todo item when Enter key is pressed.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Marks all Todo items as completed or not based on the toggle.
